titleStmt.title: To the right hon: the Lords Spirituall and Temporall, of the higher House of Parliament. The humble petition of the drapers of the towne of Shrewsbury

notesStmt.note: Against the bill passed in Commons for free trade of Welsh cloth.
Commons passed the bill on 24 April 1621, and Lords passed an amended version 16 May 1621.--STC.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library, London.
